title:
Beurling-Fourier algebras of $ q $-deformations of compact semisimple
  Lie groups and complexification
abstract:
We study Beurling-Fourier algebras of $ q $-deformations of compact
semisimple Lie groups. In particular, we show that the space of irreducible
representations of the function algebras of their Drinfeld doubles is exhausted
by the irreducible representations of weighted Fourier algebras associated to a
certain family of central weights.
